author: jeremias
msg: Changed getImageLoaderFactories() so derived image flavors are supported when querying image loader factories.

Fixes a bug in FOP where the target flavor "text/xml;form=dom" did not result in the image loader for "text/xml;form=dom;namespace=http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" being returned (which resulted in SVGs being painted without the special Batik bridges).

author: rsivaram
msg: Event prototype: Annotations for producers and consumers
